input.text: Second. We are going to create a new virtual machine. Give it a name. Select your uploaded ISO file. Be sure to select Microsoft Windows as your guest Operating system. Also, choose 2000 as your version. Enable the Qemu Agent for this machine. Next. Give your machine at least 64 Megs of disk space. Next. Give your machine a little more CPU power. Next. I'm going to give Windows 2000 4 Megs of Memory. Finally click Finish.
